lead_paragraph: Eugene Kang’s shop grew from a sometime venture in the corner of his living room into a store with skateboards, T-shirts shoes, five-panel hats and patterned socks for those in the know.

headline.main: Ring 5A for the Secret Skateshop of Washington Heights

snippet: Eugene Kang’s shop grew from a sometime venture in the corner of his living room into a store with skateboards, T-shirts shoes, five-panel hats and patterned socks for those in the know.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Terminal Skateshop, skateboard shop run by Eugene Kang out of his Washington Heights apartment.
